/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, painted in vibrant hues of red and orange, stand out against the clear blue sky. Chinese characters adorn the side of one building, hinting at the cultural richness of the city. Cars and buses fill the street, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and creating a lively atmosphere.
